content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress made in a legal case over a period of 69 days the case involves coheirs and a mediation process the parties involved are referred to as dr l dr m and dr g the mediation process began on june 22 2021 with a videoconference attended by the parties and their lawyers the case involves an inheritance estate valued at €4700 registered letters were sent to invite the parties to join the mediation proceedings but there were delivery issues new addresses were obtained and a new meeting was scheduled one party requested a postponement due to health reasons the mediator explained the advantages of mediation and all parties expressed their willingness to proceed after discussing costs and objections an agreement was reached dr m agreed to pay dr l €110000 within seven days dr g was not required to pay or receive any amount the lawyers fees and mediation fees were set off between the parties the mediation proceedings were closed and the fees were determined the parties were informed about the tax credit they would receive for the mediation fee the minutes of the conciliation were signed by the parties and their lawyers and would serve as an enforcement title the agreement was exempt from registration tax the digitally signed minutes would be sent to the parties and the mediator the summary concludes at 535 pm
